summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to economic development; authorizing the execution of a Cooperative Agreement and grant award from the United States Environmental Protection Agency in the amount of One Hundred Fifty Thousand Dollars ($150,000); accepting the money when received; increasing the 2003 Budget of the Office of Economic Development by making a reimbursable appropriation; and ratifying and confirming prior acts; all by a three-fourths vote of the City Council.
note: Brownfields Assessment Pilot Grant program, BINMIC CLEAN-UP
